name: SORE
description: Mystical puzzle quest game in a gloomy minimalism style will tell you a story of a person who's got himself into a camera, and from which there is no way out it seems. Experimental gameplay diluted with a pinch of a philosophy, that's what SORE is.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB + support WebGL 2.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Additional Notes: Supports XBox Controller
recommended_requirements: Processor: 3.0 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB + support WebGL 2.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Additional Notes: Supports XBox Controller
